commentaries.commentary: Here's the replay. Watch Schweinsteiger's quick feet past the defender.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Unbelievable control. Precise shot into the corner. Perfection.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: And another replay showing him beating the second defender.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Pure skill, fantastic! World-class from Bastian Schweinsteiger.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Player #7 with a fierce low shot!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: And look at the build-up! Player #7's incredible dribbling here!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Absolutely sensational! The ball ripples the net! What a goal!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Wonderful scenes! Player #7 embraced by Player #5. Joy!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1
